Guides Language Reference Package Index

Package

s

Initializers

🆕

Methods

🛂

Class 💈

Represents an execution thread of the program.

Initializers

🆕

🔓 🐈 🆕 callable 🍇➡️✨🍉

Creates an new thread and calls the given callable callable on the newly created thread.

Methods

🛂

🔓 🐖 🛂 ➡️ ✨

Blocks the calling thread until this thread has finished work.

Class Methods

⏲

🔓 🐇🐖 ⏲ microseconds 🚂 ➡️ ✨

Suspends the calling thread from execution for at least the number of microseconds specified by the argument microseconds.
